ComicInfo.Summary:
With their numbers dwindling, Debbie still captive, and no way to get help, Pamela and the hikers attempt to turn the tables on their attackers, tracking them back to their labyrinthine lair. They must find a way to get inside… before Debbie runs out of time.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sean Chen & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Caanan White & Ceci de la Cruz | 2 | C | Cover C | Renato Rei & Wes Hartman | 3 | D | Cover D | Harvey Tolibao & Mohan Sivakami | 4 | Note: The digital edition (6/20/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-02 18:20:40. [CVDB674362]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Caanan White, Ceci de la Cruz, Harvey Tolibao, Ivan Nunes, Mohan Sivakami, Renato Rei, Sean Chen, Wes Hartman
